predicate.note: Frames file for 'shed' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and ectb2. No access to verbnet. Comparison to 'eliminate' and 'fall'.

roleset.name: get rid of, remove
roleset.note: No access to verbnet. Comparison to 'eliminate' and 'fall'.

example.name: transitive
example.text: [The Conservative government]-1's decision may reflect its desire *trace*-1 to shed a politically sensitive issue well before the next election, expected in late 1991.
example.arg: well before the next election, expected in late 1991

roleset.note: "constantly" could also be MNR, I s'pose.

role.descr: end point, end state of arg1

example.name: those darn stock reports
example.text: Other banks were slightly more resilient, with Dresdner Bank shedding 4.8 to 320, and Commerzbank slipping 2.5 to...
Perhaps [the following figures]-1 can help *-1 shed some light on this matter.
